hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
### A utility. This one you'll need to edit the PHP file and enter wich taxon file you want to process. #php gen_higherClass.php
### This will add higherClassification in taxon.tab and rebuild the DwCA. With carry-over of other extensions. ### source is: Brazilian_Flora.tar.gz #php dwca_utility.php _ '{"resource_id": "Brazilian_Flora", "task": "gen_hC_using_pID"}' #using parentNameUsageID ### generates FILENAME-with-hC.tar.gz
### This use gnparser one name at a time. Not entire file. #php run_gnparser_dwca.php _ '{"resource_id": "Brazilian_Flora-with-hC"}' #OK gen neo4j_1
### Start matching taxa #php match_taxa_2DH.php _ '{"resource_id": "Brazilian_Flora-with-hC"}' #OK gen neo4j_2
### Convert taxon.tab, use EOLid value for taxonID. ### REMINDER: Multiple scinames with different taxonIDs have the same canonical thus will have the same EOLid php use_EOLid_as_taxonID.php _ '{"resource_id": "Brazilian_Flora-with-hC"}' # gen neo4j_3
### rename cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp Brazilian_Flora-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz Brazilian_Flora_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz ls -lt Brazilian_Flora-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz ls -lt Brazilian_Flora_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz rm -f Brazilian_Flora-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz
